name: unappetizing
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
Unappetizing food does not look or smell attractive and does not make you want to eat it: If you overcook pasta before freezing it, its texture will be unappetizing once it's defrosted.
not attractive or pleasant: The waterfront is distinctly unappetizing: a mixture of broken concrete, raw sewage, and piles of garbage tossed over garden walls.
More examplesFewer examplesPatients are reluctant to eat meals that are unappetizing. Many people find milk products unappetizing.People from this tribe were not allowed to own cattle so they had to hunt the unappetizing wild game, something a Masai would never do.Although I found the food unappetizing, I warmed to the atmosphere of the place.High capital costs could make such projects unappetizing for investors to swallow without federal incentives.
